welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Athol, where small town charm meets breathtaking nature. Get ready to explore our quaint streets, scenic trails, and local shops and restaurants. We hope you enjoy your stay and fall in love with all that Athol has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
